snippet: To create legal clarity since a court ruling in June equated circumcision with bodily injury, justice officials in Berlin laid out guidelines to allow the practice to continue in the city.
abstract: Justice officials in Berlin lay out guidelines on circumcision to allow the practice to continue in the city pending nationwide legislation that is expected to back the procedure; it is the first move to create legal clarity since a court ruling in June equated circumcision with bodily injury.
lead_paragraph: To create legal clarity since a court ruling in June equated circumcision with bodily injury, justice officials in Berlin laid out guidelines to allow the practice to continue in the city.

headline.main: Germany: Officials in Berlin Clarify Guidelines on Circumcision
headline.print_headline: Germany: Officials in Berlin Clarify Guidelines On Circumcision to Ease Doctors’ Concerns on Ruling
